p: Cell viability after exposure to the various extracts of Z. rhetsa and prednisolone (Pred) (positive control) is presented in Figure 2(a) for inhibition of LPS-induced NO and TNF- Î± production and in Figure 2(b) for inhibition of LPS-induced PGE 2 production. The various extracts of Z. rhetsa and prednisolone (Pred) showed greater than 70% cell viability at all concentrations when they were tested.
